travelTips: Purchase a Paris Museum Pass to save money on attractions

name: Mumbai
description: India's bustling financial capital, famous for Bollywood, colonial architecture, vibrant street life, and the Arabian Sea coastline.

attractions.description: Popular beach for sunsets, street food, and Bollywood celebrity spotting.

restaurants.description: Historic Irani cafe and Mumbai institution serving global cuisine.

travelTips: Use local trains or metro for efficient travel, but avoid rush hour.
Try Mumbai's famous street food like vada pav, pav bhaji, and bhel puri.
Book tickets for Elephanta Caves ferry in advance.
Be cautious of monsoon season (June-September) due to heavy rains.
Negotiate prices at markets and with auto-rickshaw drivers.
Respect local customs when visiting temples and religious sites.
Carry cash for small purchases; not all places accept cards.
